snippet: President Andry Rajoelina said Tuesday he would not run in May elections, bowing to international pressure to give the nation a fresh start after the coup that brought him to power in 2009.
abstract: Madagascar Pres Andry Rajoelina says he will not run in May elections, bowing to international pressure to give nation fresh start after coup that brought him to power in 2009.
lead_paragraph: President Andry Rajoelina said Tuesday he would not run in May elections, bowing to international pressure to give the nation a fresh start after the coup that brought him to power in 2009.

headline.seo: Madagascar: President Opts Out of Race
